Intelligence Essence.quote: The divine intelligence pervades all existence. (Bhagavad Gita 13.14)

Cosmic Mind.quote: The Universe is mental - held in the Mind of the All. (The Kybalion)

Divine Wisdom.quote: Wisdom was created before all things. (Ecclesiasticus 1:4)

Universal Knowledge.quote: Allah encompasses all things in knowledge. (Quran 65:12)

Omniscience.quote: He knows what is manifest and what is hidden. (Quran 6:73)

Creative Intelligence.quote: By wisdom the Lord laid the earth's foundations. (Proverbs 3:19)

Supreme Intellect.quote: The supreme intelligence is beyond all change. (Yoga Sutras 4.18)

Divine Thought.quote: For my thoughts are not your thoughts. (Isaiah 55:8)

Cosmic Intelligence.quote: The divine intelligence moves all things. (Aristotle, Metaphysics)

Divine Knowledge Systems.quote: In whom are hidden all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge. (Colossians 2:3)

Intelligence Hierarchy.quote: From intelligence comes wisdom, from wisdom comes liberation. (Vedanta)

Divine Reason.quote: The Logos (Divine Reason) orders all things. (Heraclitus)

Intelligence Operations.quote: The Spirit searches all things, even the deep things of God. (1 Corinthians 2:10)

Divine Cognition.quote: Before a word is on my tongue you, Lord, know it completely. (Psalm 139:4)

Intelligence Manifestation.quote: As above, so below; as below, so above. (Hermes Trismegistus)

Divine Perception.quote: Nothing in all creation is hidden from God's sight. (Hebrews 4:13)

Intelligence Design.quote: How many are your works, Lord! In wisdom you made them all. (Psalm 104:24)

Divine Planning.quote: Known unto God are all his works from the beginning of the world. (Acts 15:18)

Eternal Mind.quote: The eternal mind knows all things simultaneously. (Thomas Aquinas)

Intelligence Patterns.quote: The patterns of divine intelligence are reflected in all creation. (Ibn Arabi)

Divine Computation.quote: He numbers the stars and calls them each by name. (Psalm 147:4)

Intelligence Network.quote: In him all things hold together. (Colossians 1:17)

Divine Analytics.quote: I am he who searches hearts and minds. (Revelation 2:23)

Intelligence Matrix.quote: In your light we see light. (Psalm 36:9)

Divine Logic.quote: Come now, let us reason together. (Isaiah 1:18)

Intelligence Flow.quote: The Tao flows everywhere. (Tao Te Ching 34)

Divine Order.quote: God is not a God of disorder but of peace. (1 Corinthians 14:33)

Intelligence Evolution.quote: Ever-expanding consciousness is the nature of divine intelligence. (Sri Aurobindo)
